title: #602: The Surprising Science of Six-Figure Thinking
description: Ever looked back at an old Facebook post and cringed? According to Olga Khazan, staff writer at The Atlantic, that discomfort is evidence of something powerful: your personality has changed, even if you didn’t notice it happening. In our latest episode, Khazan, who recently wrote a book on the science of personality change, breaks down [...]
author: Paula Pant
